Articles.Content:
Hello there good Sir/Mam!

If you are reading this, you are awesome!

I need halp! Got an idea, Want to create a Part, for stations/mother ships. Its basically, a large expensive part that drains LOTS of electricity and Lets you put spacecrafts in orbit around the craft with the part!

Dont know how to code this, but modeling/texturing is no problemo! Have some functionality ideas planned.

If you are intrested, send me a pm!

Hello, I haven't test it but I think that's what does Extraplanetary Launchpads ?

Edited November 13, 2014 by Malah
